function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of control over data collected by private entities","Impact":"Risk of data misuse and privacy violations","Mitigation":"Implement strict data privacy regulations and agreements","Technologies":"Data encryption and anonymization technologies","People":"Citizens and public sector","Owner":"Government and regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Lack of universal standards for data management","Impact":"Difficulty in controlling the intended purpose of the data","Mitigation":"Establish universal standards and regulations for data management","Technologies":"Data management and governance platforms","People":"Government and regulatory bodies","Owner":"Government and industry organizations"},{"Description":"Public mistrust of private sector involvement in data management","Impact":"Loss of public trust and perception of data misuse for profit","Mitigation":"Transparency in public-private partnerships, public disclosure of agreements","Technologies":"Blockchain for transparent record-keeping","People":"Citizens, public sector, private companies","Owner":"Government and private sector"}]}
